Contact Me

Services

I offer a range of services, from the initial design to the development of a responsive, accesible and user friendly website.
I also consult on web accessibility issues and I am available for public speaking about responsive and accessible web design, and about the accessibility principles in general.

  • WordPress development
  • Responsive Web design and development
  • Accessible Web design and development
  • Accessibility audits

Contact me if you would like to discuss any of the above in more detail.
